3.name: Electrocution
3.description: Storing over a million volts, Maxwell Dillon embodies electricity itself to wreak havoc on his opponent.

signature.name: Electrostatic
signature.description: Building Power levels in both players charge the atmosphere, increasing Critical Hit Rate.

description: Max Dillon was just an electrical engineer doing his job. But a lightning strike jolted him into the menacing supervillain known as Electro! With the ability to command up to a million volts of electricity, deliver lethal shocks, or shoot lightning, he has become an infamous criminal, and adversary to Spider-Man.
